findings.lung: Bilateral linear atelectases noted in the lung bases.
findings.liver: Geographic dropout in signal consistent with patchy fatty infiltration; high intensity lesion in segment VII measuring 0.7 cm consistent with hemangioma; no intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation.
findings.pancreas: Area of slightly low intensity that likely represents an artifact; pancreatic duct is duplicated with normal caliber.
findings.kidneys: Left kidney shows a 2.7 cm Bosniak type 2 cyst; right kidney is within normal limits.
